ygData.subject: Re: Level 7
ygData.msgSnippet: The trip to Freeport from the Qeynos areas is harrowing at best for a Necro. Not only will the beasties try to do you in, but many of the NPC farmers will
ygData.messageBody:
The trip to Freeport from the Qeynos areas is harrowing at best for a Necro.
Not only will the beasties try to do you in, but many of the NPC farmers
will chase after you. I finally just said screwit and waited until I hit
8th so I would have the benefit of gather shadows. The way I went from 7th
to 8 rather quickly was basically soloing blackburrow. There's so many
people in there it can be difficult to actually get a kill, but this also
works for you in that trains are pretty rare now, and when there is one,
there are many targets for them to focus on, allowing a hasty retreat.

-Mark

----- Original Message -----
From: Brian G. <bwgogol@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, April 24, 1999 7:20 AM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Re: Level 7


> From: "Brian G." <bwgogol@...>
>
> That's *exactly* the reason I started Kagon, and haven't played my
> ranger since (except once, I feel kinda ..guilty and stuff..). I read
> your post and was mildly concerned since I was nearing 7 myself. Well,
> when I hit 7 last night...there was barely anything to fight! Ok, I
> may be overexagerating, but kodiak's were still yellow (I got
> slaughtered by one, thinking I was smart, but I was just
> ill-prepared), and now almost all black bears and shadow wolves are
> green. The only whites I saw the rest of the night was a tree snake
> and a skel near the ruins, which are camped like mad anyway. I'm
> thinking of taking a trip over to the Freeport area, maybe more stuff
> over there? Personally, I think Kagon would enjoy flaying a halfling
> or two, but the 2 locations he has been to so far are not suitable
> yet. =P *shudders at the memory of being burned to death by 3 halfling
> spellcasters and bludgeoned by 4 skels at the same time*
> Good luck!
>
> Kagon - Fennin
>
>
> From: Pete Holmes <peh2000@...>
>
> Thanks to all for the responses. I'm looking forward to playing and
> getting to 8 and above. It's funny, I started this Necromancer just
> on a whim when I got a little bored with my Ranger and I haven't
> played
> my Ranger since. My friends in Kelethin are not pleased...
>
> Saga-Mith.Marr
